entry.title: [BHS/GRA][Data & Analytics] - Logs Data Platform maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 17, 12:00 - 16:00 UTC

Jul 15, 20:38 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our Logs Data Platform offering.

Start time : 17/09/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 17/09/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : The public API of Logs Data Platform product will be on read only mode during the whole maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on Logs Data Platform offering.
For more information about IAM for Logs Data Platform, you can visit this documentation: KB0071667

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [SBG/DE/RBX/EU-WEST-PAR/UK][Identity, Security & Operations] - Secret Management Service
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 3, 12:00 - 15:00 UTC

Aug 27, 19:20 UTC
Scheduled - We want to inform you about an upcoming maintenance window for our Secret Management Service.

Here are the details of the maintenance:

Start time : 03/09/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 03/09/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance window, you may encounter the following impacts on SBG, DE, RBX, EU-WEST-PAR, UK, on a short period of time:

You may not be able to perform Administration tasks on Load Balancer service (creation, deletion, etc.)
You may not be able to perform Administration tasks on Encrypted Volumes (creation, deletion, etc.)
Service of already deployed will not be affected, from end-user perspective

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Secret Management Service.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

entry.title: [SBG7][Network] - Network maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 1, 07:00 - 15:00 UTC

Aug 27, 17:43 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our network infrastructure in the public cloud region SBG7.

Start time : 01/09/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 01/09/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact :The network of all public cloud compute, loadbalancer and routers located in the region SBG7 will observe up to 2 seconds of packet loss.

Packet loss for compute instances and loadbalancers will be only observed once per service anytime between 07:00 UTC and 08:15 UTC.

Packet loss for routers will can be observed once per router anytime between 07:00 UTC and 15:00 UTC.
Service improvement :As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our network infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [LIM3][Compute Instance]- Instances incident notification
entry.content:
Aug 31, 11:45 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our compute - Instance in LIM3 region.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 31/08/2025 11:24 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some instances are temporarily unavailable in the specified region.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their instances located in the specified region.
Root Cause : A service disruption occurred due to an unexpected infrastructure failure
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Aug 31, 11:33 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Compute - Instance offer in LIM3 region.

Start time : 31/08/2025 11:24 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA][Storage] - Volume Snapshot (Ceph) and Block Storage incident notification
entry.content:
Aug 29, 11:47 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident affecting our storage service has now been resolved.
The region GRA is now available, although it is still recovering and experiencing minor degraded performance.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 29/08/2025 06:08 UTC
End time : 29/08/2025 11:21 UTC

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Aug 29, 10:34 UTC
Update - Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Please be informed that the region GRA5 is now available, although it is still recovering and experiencing degraded performance.
Ongoing Actions : For the affected customers, our teams are mobilised to restore service in the region GRA11 as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Aug 29, 09:03 UTC
Update - Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Please be informed that the region GRA7 is now available, although it is still recovering and experiencing degraded performance.
Ongoing Actions : For the affected customers, our teams are mobilised to restore service in the regions GRA5 and GRA11 as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Aug 29, 07:06 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Aug 29, 06:45 UTC

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : We would like to inform you that a significant number of servers are now operational.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Aug 29, 06:35 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Aug 29, 06:31 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Storage offer on the specific region GRA3.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 29/08/2025 06:08 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers snapshot (Ceph) and Block storage are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their snapshot (Ceph) and block storage located on the specified region.

Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.
